definition: to moan about imaginary illness/fussing like a hypochondriac/fig. sentimental nonsense
to chant/to recite/to moan/to groan/cry (of certain animals and insects)/song (ancient poem)

sentences.english: To write the true natural expression of emotions, can not be affected and moan and groan without being ill.
sentences.chinese: 要寫真實情感的自然流露，不可做作和無病呻吟。

sentences.english: Sometimes people always make a fuss about nothing.
sentences.chinese: 大多數時候人們總是在無病呻吟。

sentences.english: Accustomed to making a fuss, the dull interpreted as a kind of mood.
sentences.chinese: 習慣了無病呻吟，把無聊演繹成一種情調。

sentences.english: He has a strong dislike for the sentimental.
sentences.chinese: 他非常討厭多愁善感無病呻吟。

sentences.english: This is never good content in this area, only some fuss.
sentences.chinese: 這樣這個區永遠沒有好內容，只有一些無病呻吟。

sentences.english: This type likes to moan and complain about everything.
sentences.chinese: 這類人經常無病呻吟或者抱怨所有。

sentences.english: Well um, it's about a sickly, sentimental story.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，這是一個關於無病呻吟的故事。

sentences.english: If you still complain in traditional thinking way, that's making a fuss about an imaginary illness.
sentences.chinese: 不能用傳統的思維來埋怨什麼，這就是無病呻吟了。

sentences.english: No moping , or I'm calling your brothers to come and get you.
sentences.chinese: 不要無病呻吟，否則我就叫你的兄弟來把你帶走。

sentences.english: However, this amusing symptom of ours never seems to stop.
sentences.chinese: 而我們可笑的無病呻吟卻從不停止。

definition: to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
lit. looking at one's shadow and feeling sorry for oneself (idiom)/fig. alone and dejected
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
(of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
